articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Google to give app devs access to Gemini Nano for on-device AI - Ars Technica
articles.description: New APIs for Google’s ML Kit will let developers plug into the on-device AI model.

articles.content:
Epic Games claims that Apple is blocking its Fortnite app from the U.S. and EU App Stores.
